sect1.title: Search result pagination
sect1.para: As it was mentioned above, search result hit objects use lazy loading for stored document fields. When any of stored field is accessed, complete document is loaded.

Do not retrieve all documents if you actually need to work only with some portion of them. Go through search result and store document IDs and probably score somewhere to retrive documents from the index at next script execution:
